description:
Shachi is believed to have already died fighting Kaioh to protect Leia. But the female visages in the Holy Temple of Asura create a mysterious resonance, and with tears in his eyes, Shachi rises again. Even as heavily overwhelmed as he had been, he launches a counterattack so ferocious that it even shocks Kaioh. It all comes from the power of love... Kaioh, now convinced that the main family`s ultimate technique is love, seeks to prove the superiority of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist that he uses for his evil ultimate art.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mort de Shachi, le guerrier de l`amour ! Sache que sans l`amour, l`homme n`est rien !!
The Fall of Shachi, Warrior of Love! Love Is Everything, My Friends!!
愛の戦士シャチ死す! 友よ, 愛こそすべてと知れ!!
